contentencoded:
Share prices in Germany hit a new record high today. Asian markets were strong. But U.S. markets were down slightly this morning.

Carl Riccadonna, senior U.S. economist at Deutsche Bank, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio with more about the direction of the markets.

title: After another strong day globally, stocks turn down in the U.S.
